titles.title: Expanding Service Coordinators Act of 2025
Expanding Service Coordinators Act of 2025
To amend the Housing and Community Development Act of 1992 to expand certain service coordinator programs, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Financial Services, and in addition to the Committee on Education and Workforce, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

Referred to the Committee on Financial Services, and in addition to the Committee on Education and Workforce, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
